content.rendered:
AqualisBraemar is involved in offshore decommissioning in terms of performing engineering assessment for removal of offshore structures, transportation and load-in operations.

  • Decommissioning Engineering
    • Pre-decommissioning survey
    • Fixed platforms (removal in part or as a whole)
    • Floating structures (removal of mooring system, riser )
    • Subsea pipeline/umbilical
  • Station Keeping Analysis of the Floating Structure during Removal
  • Mooring Analysis/ DP Capability Analysis of Decommissioning Vessel
  • Transportation Engineering
  • Load-In Engineering

jetpack-related-posts.title: Our Organisations
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar AqualisBraemar is a company that, through its subsidiaries and associates, offers adjusting, marine, offshore and renewables consultancy services to the energy, shipping and insurance industries. The group employs specialist engineers, naval architects, master mariners, loss adjusters and technical consultants in 48 offices located across 33 countries. Offshore Wind Consultants…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Warranty Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The AqualisBraemar teams of Marine Warranty Surveyors, Engineers and Master Mariners act to protect Underwriters’ interests or self-insured Clients. We provide independent third party review and approval of offshore projects.
